      • resetProps

        public ClusterInfo resetProps(PropertyList propertyList,
                     boolean removeObsoleteProps)
        Reset configuration properties to their default values. Properties with no default values will remain unchanged.

        API Call: POST /config/properties/reset

        Parameters:
        propertyList - Configuration properties to reset
        removeObsoleteProps - If true, removes obsolete properties
        Returns:
        The cluster information

      • resetProps

        public ClusterInfo resetProps(PropertyList propertyList)
        Reset configuration properties to their default values. Properties with no default values will remain unchanged. Removes obsolete properties.
        Parameters:
        propertyList - Configuration properties to reset
        Returns:
        The cluster information

      • getVisiblePropertiesISO

        public java.io.InputStream getVisiblePropertiesISO()
        Get ISO9660 image with one file (under root directory) having system properties that are visible on all nodes (includes control& object). This is required for data service VM deployment.

        API Call: GET /config/datanode-config

        Returns:
        The ISO image byte stream with 48KB size.

      • resetExtraNodesUpgradeLock

        public void resetExtraNodesUpgradeLock()
        Reset extra nodes' upgrade lock After starting reboot, an extra node will hold the upgrade lock until the node comes back again. If it doesn't come back in a long time, we have to release the lock. Otherwise, the cluster state will be shown as 'DEGRADED', which prevents us from doing any other operations.

        API Call: POST /config/extranodes-upgradelock/reset
